title: Scheduled myki maintenance Saturday 26 October, 12am to 6am
articleContent:
myki accounts, online top ups and instant top ups through PTV app and Google Wallet will be unavailable while planned software updates take place on Saturday 26 October, 12am to 6am.

You'll be able to access your myki account and top up online when we've completed the updates.

During the updates, you can top up your myki card at:

  • hundreds of shops including 7-Eleven within the myki boundary
  • myki machines at selected stations and stops
  • premium station ticket offices

Find your nearest place to top up.

Thank you for your patience while we complete these updates.
